doc.title: Wheel Love TV
doc.plot: The Wildfire Motion Picture Company production, Wheel Love TV, is a series dedicated to those people that have found 'WHEEL LOVE' for their classic, custom or modified car. The host "Ed" (Ed Szegvary) is one man, on one simple mission to find 'wheel love'. He hunts down drivers that he believes may have a true love for their car. The owner then discusses the restoration process that brought this classic car to it's present condition. The show is created and produced by the Szegavry Brothers. The show has a groovy rap soundtrack and an educational slant.
